name: Website Redesign
description: Complete redesign of the company website with modern UI/UX, responsive design, and improved user experience. The project includes user research, wireframing, design mockups, and development.
deliverables: Wireframes, UI mockups, responsive website, SEO optimization, content migration, testing documentation

milestones.title: User Research & Analysis
milestones.description: Conduct user interviews, surveys, and competitive analysis to inform design decisions

milestones.title: Wireframes & Prototypes
milestones.description: Create detailed wireframes and interactive prototypes for key user flows

milestones.title: Visual Design Mockups
milestones.description: Develop high-fidelity visual designs with branding and UI components

name: Mobile App Development
description: Development of a cross-platform mobile application for iOS and Android. Features include user authentication, real-time notifications, data synchronization, and offline capabilities.
deliverables: Technical requirements, app architecture, iOS app, Android app, API documentation, user manual

milestones.title: Technical Requirements Document
milestones.description: Define detailed technical specifications and system architecture

milestones.title: UI/UX Design Phase
milestones.description: Complete app design including user flows, wireframes, and visual mockups

name: Brand Identity Package
description: Complete brand identity design including logo, color palette, typography, business cards, letterheads, and brand guidelines. The package will establish a cohesive visual identity across all touchpoints.
deliverables: Logo variations, brand guidelines, business card design, letterhead template, brand assets package

milestones.title: Logo Design & Variations
milestones.description: Create primary logo and various format adaptations

milestones.title: Brand Guidelines Document
milestones.description: Comprehensive brand guidelines with usage rules and examples

name: E-commerce Platform
description: Custom e-commerce solution with product catalog, shopping cart, payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard. Built with scalability and performance in mind.
deliverables: Database design, frontend application, admin dashboard, payment gateway integration, inventory system, user documentation

milestones.title: Database Schema Design
milestones.description: Design and implement the complete database structure

name: Data Analytics Dashboard
description: Interactive dashboard for visualizing business metrics and KPIs. Features real-time data updates, customizable charts, export functionality, and role-based access control.
deliverables: Dashboard mockups, data visualization components, reporting system, user access controls, API integration

milestones.title: Data Source Integration
milestones.description: Connect and configure all required data sources and APIs

milestones.title: Core Dashboard Components
milestones.description: Develop primary dashboard widgets and visualization components
